redcards.cardCaption: It’s that time of the week – grocery shopping!
You’re organising a party. Time to buy some supplies!
Cars don’t work without petrol, fill up the car!
Time to get fit with a gym membership
Don’t forget to turn the lights off – electricity bill!
You decided to try out a monthly train ticket
Guitar lessons. You’re getting pretty good!
You're going on a school trip
All your favourite TV shows aren’t free - Netflix bill
Entry fee for your new club
Subscription fee for your favourite magazine
